name: IMAGINE Lens Flare File
summary: A LEN file is an effects file used by ERDAS IMAGINE, a geospatial data authoring application widely used by archaeologists, engineers, biologists, geologists, inspectors, and soil scientists. It contains lens flare effects that can be added to a 2D or 3D scene in IMAGINE when imported.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
